page.title: 10THE GRANGE CENTRE,MIDHURST
page.content: The Grange Centre was opened in 1979 and the second phase was completed in 1981.It is a joint venture between the West Sussex County Council and the Midhurst District Community Association.It has 2 squash courts,a sports hall,sun lounge and fitness training room.Many clubs are based there such as bridge,bingo,gymnastics and all kinds of sports.Some weekly classes are held for adults and young people.Patrons come from a 12 mile radius.A day centre dor the elderly, handicapped and very young provides advice,companionship and useful occupation for those who attend.It is administered by W.S.C.C. In the evenings public meetings,discos and varied music and drama performances take place.At weekends there are monthly markets,special exhibitions and fairs.It is a very lively centre.
